1.「あっ <pc>も パラディンの必殺技を| 覚えるための修行を してきたところな: Oh, <pc> has just trained to learn|the special moves of a paladin? I just did|that too!

2.「きっと 次は パラディンガードで| ジェニャを 守る任務なのだ！| オイラ は: Surely, my next assignment will be to protect|Jenya with the Knight Watch! I trained hard to|become a Paladin Guard.

3.「さあ ストロング団長に報告して| 必殺技を 伝授してもらうのだ！: Now, report to Commander Strong and ask him to|teach you his special move!

4.「緊急召集で 発表された話……| 真実なんですよね？| ジェニャに そんな役割が: The story that was announced at the emergency|call... it's true, isn't it? I didn't know|Jenya had that kind of role.

6.「ならわしのことは 知っていたが| まさか今年が その年だったとはな……。: I knew of the "Narimasu", but I had no idea|that this was the year...

7.「１００年に一度 大地の竜に いけにえを| 捧げる年……。しかも あのジェニャど: Once every 100 years, a sacrifice is made to|the dragon of the earth... and Jenya is the|sacrificial victim. ...

9.「どういうことなのだ！？| オイラたちは ジェニャを守るために| 必殺技の修行に: What's going on? I went there to train to kill|to protect Jenya!

10.「なのに どうして| ジェニャが いけにえなのだ！？: So why is Jenya a sacrifice?

11.「………必殺技は ジェニャどのを| 無事に 大地の竜バウギアのもとへ| 送り届け: ...the special move was necessary to get Jenya|safely back to Earthwyrm.

15.「…………オレたちだって| 守るために 命をかける 王宮パラディンだ。| そんな: We're palace paladins who die to protect and|serve. That's not what I want to do.

16.「だが…… 大地の竜が目覚めれば 大規模な| 地震が起き この大陸は 壊滅の危機:
But... if the dragon of the earth awakens, it|will cause a massive earthquake that will|threaten to destroy this continent. There is|
|no other way to put the dragon to sleep|again...

17.「たくさんの人を救うためだから| ジェニャを 犠牲にしていいって言うのだ！？|: You are willing to sacrifice Jenya to save so|many people! I will not allow such a thing!

20.「あたしが生まれたんは 山奥の 貧しい集落で| 小さい子たちが 食べるものがなく: I was born in a poor village deep in the|mountains where small children were dying|every day for lack of food.

21.「みんなの生活費を かせぐために| がんばってたんやけど それじゃあ 全然| 足: We were working hard to make ends meet for|everyone, but the village was so poor that|that was not enough at all.

22.「そんな集落が なくならへんのは はるか昔| 大地の竜と交わした 約束があるから:
The reason such settlements have not|disappeared is because of a promise made long|ago with the dragon of the earth. To dedicate|
|every girl born in the tribe...

23.「だから グロスナー王に お願いしてん。| あたしが いけにえになるから お金く:
So I asked King Grossner for a favor. I'm|going to become a sacrifice, so please give me|some money. Please give food to everyone in|
|the village.

24.「グロスナー王は めっちゃ いい人でな。| たくさん お金くれたんよ！| だから: King Grossner was a very nice man. He gave me|lots of money! So I have nothing to worry|about anymore.

25.「あの時の…… お金が そうだったのだ？| ジェニャを迎えにいったとき| おばあ: That... that was the money, wasn't it? That|box of money you gave the old lady when you|went to pick up Jenya.

26.「そうや！ グロスナー王もな ほんまは| 誰かを犠牲にするなんて イヤやねんて。: That's right! King Grossner really doesn't|like the idea of sacrificing anyone. But...|this can't be helped.

27.「せやからな…… わかってや ズーボーはん。| あたしは これで満足やねん。時が: So... you have to understand, Mr. Zubo. I'm|happy now. When the time comes, I want you to|take me to the dragon of the earth.

30.「ひとたび目覚めれば 大規模な地震を起こし| この大陸を たやすく 海に沈めてし:
Once awakened, it will cause massive|earthquakes and easily submerge this continent|into the sea. There is no way to resist the|
|dragon of the earth...

31.「あきらめろ ズーボー。| これは グロスナー王の決断であり 命令だ！: Give it up, Zubo. This is King Grossner's|decision and order!

32.「……お前たちには パラディンとして| これからも 成長してくれることを期待し|: ...I hope you will continue to grow as|paladins, and I will teach you the special|technique Knight Watch!

33.「……お前たちには パラディンとして| これからも 成長してくれることを期待し|: ...I present to you the rewards of your|training in the hope that you will continue to|grow as paladins!

34.「オレたちは 王宮パラディンとして| グロスナー王の命令を 果たす！| 賛同でき:
We, the paladins of the royal court, will|fulfill King Grossner's command! Those of you|who do not agree, do not accept the next|
|assignment! That is all!

37.「大丈夫です ジェニャさま。| しばらくアタマを冷やせば| ズーボーさんも わか: It's all right, Jenya. I'm sure Mr. Zubo will|understand if you let your head cool down for|a while.

38.「さあ…… お部屋に戻りましょう。: Now... let's go back to your room.
